member.name: M:InsurenceManagementSystemWebApi.Controllers.AdminController.GetAllCustomers(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves a paginated list of all customer profiles. Accessible only to users with the Admin role.
member.param: The page number to retrieve. Defaults to 1.
The number of customer profiles per page. Defaults to 10.
member.returns: An containing a . Returns 200 OK with the paginated customer data if successful, or 404 Not Found if no customers are found or the operation fails.
member.remarks: This endpoint is restricted to users with the Admin role. It is used to fetch customer profile data in a paginated format. The response includes metadata such as total count, current page, and page size.

member.name: M:InsurenceManagementSystemWebApi.Controllers.AdminController.GetAllAgents(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves a paginated list of all agents. Accessible only by users with the Admin role.
member.param: The page number to retrieve. Defaults to 1.
The number of agents per page. Defaults to 10.
member.returns: Returns an containing the result of the operation. If successful, returns an HTTP 200 OK response with the list of agents. If the operation fails, returns an HTTP 404 Not Found response with the error details.
member.remarks: This endpoint is protected and requires the user to have the Admin role.

member.name: M:InsurenceManagementSystemWebApi.Controllers.AuthController.GetRole
member.summary: Retrieves the role information for the current user or system.
member.returns: An containing an of the role data. Returns 200 OK with the role information if successful. Returns 400 Bad Request if the retrieval fails (e.g., service error, no role found).
member.remarks: This endpoint requires the user to have one of the following roles: 'MaintenanceEngineer', 'Developer', 'NetworkEngineer', 'DevOpsEngineer', 'DatabaseAdministrator', 'Tester', or 'Manager'. It delegates the retrieval of role information to the employee service.
